scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../../../fsOpen-2021/part2/phonebook/ && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../../HerokuFSOpen/fsOpen-2021_part3/fsOpen-2021_part3_phonebook/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push heroku master && npm run deploy
